description: This file defines a React component for a scheduling page that allows users to create, view, and manage service scheduling rules. It uses Zustand for state management, react-hook-form for form handling, zod for validation, and various UI components for rendering the interface.

methods.name: toHHMM
methods.description: Converts a Date object to a string in HH:mm format.

methods.name: fromHHMM
methods.description: Parses a HH:mm string into a Date object.

methods.name: SchedulerPage
methods.description: Main React functional component rendering the scheduling UI, including form inputs, rules list, and associated handlers.
